page.title: 15Community Centre-Uses
page.content:
Use of the Community Centre
{Clubs}which use the centre are:- Camera Club Floral Society Art Society Chess Club Rifle Club Angling Club Computer Club Ladies Afternoon Club The following{classes}meet weekly:- Children's Dancing Class Machine Knitting Class Public Speaking Class Birthday parties, wedding receptions,discos and dances are held at the discretion of the management committee. The Member of Parliament for the Caerphilly Constituency, Mr. Ron Davies, uses the centre to hold a regular surgery.
